DocLocalization.Name: Festkörper - Entlang einer Leitlinie mit konstanter Richtung extrudiert

DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping the _SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.SweptArea_ along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: StartParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the _Directrix_ at which the sweeping operation commences. If no value is provided the start of the sweeping operation is at the start of the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: EndParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the _Directrix_ at which the sweeping operation ends. < style="color:blue">If no value is provided the end of the sweeping operation is at the end of the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: FixedReference
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction providing the fixed axis1 (x-axis) direction for orienting the swept area during the sweeping operation along the _Directrix_.

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixBounded
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the values for _StartParam_ or _EndParam_ are omited, then the _Directrix_ has to be a bounded or closed curve.
